text: Abandu bahebwa eshitabu (abayahudi) benyanga mbu eshitabu shibeeshele okhurula mwikulu. Ne toto benya khu Musa amakhongo kashila kano. Olwababoola mbu; “Khulolosie Nyasaye mang’alang’ala” mana likulu nilibopa khulwobukhayi bwabu. Mana nibakhola eshimosi (okhuba Nyasaye wabu) ebifune biefu biatoto nibimalile okhuboolela, mana nikhubaleshela ako nikhuhelesia Musa ebifune bili habulafu
